dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Mille pas géométriques" and "Stades".
Shows topography, drainage, territories of the twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Features 2 decorative title cartouches with illustrations of biblical references.
Inset map: Carte de la terre de Canaan ou Terre Promise à Abraham et à la posterité...
